00034 #ifndef HARPS_COMPORNENT_MUL
00035 #define HARPS_COMPORNENT_MUL
00036 
00037 #include <harps/dummy.hpp>
00038 #include <harps/utils.hpp>
00039 #include <harps/clock.hpp>
00040 #include <harps/buffer.hpp>
00041 #include <harps/note.hpp>
00042 
00043 #include <harps/compornent/combiner.hpp>
00044 
00045 #include <boost/preprocessor.hpp>
00046 #include <boost/static_assert.hpp>
00047 
00048 #define HARPS_PP_MUL_OPERATION_ONCE \
00049   module0( _buffer, _clock, _note ); \
00050   Buffer< SampleType > temp_buffer; \
00051   typename Buffer< SampleType >::SampleType *raw_buffer = _buffer.get(); \
00052   typename Buffer< SampleType >::SampleType *raw_temp_buffer = temp_buffer.get(); \
00053   int index;
00054 
00055 #define HARPS_PP_MUL_OPERATION_LOOP( z, module_index, unused ) \
00056   temp_buffer.reset(); \
00057   BOOST_PP_CAT( module, module_index ) ( temp_buffer, _clock, _note ); \
00058   for( index = 0; index != SAMPLE_COUNT; index++ ) \
00059     raw_buffer[ index ] *= raw_temp_buffer[ index ]; \
00060   _buffer.mergeVote( temp_buffer );
00061 
00062 #define HARPS_PP_MUL_SPECIALIZATION( z, active_module_count, unused ) \
00063   template< \
00064   BOOST_PP_REPEAT( active_module_count, HARPS_PP_MODULE_TYPENAME, active_module_count ) \
00065   > \
00066   class Mul< \
00067         BOOST_PP_REPEAT( active_module_count, HARPS_PP_MODULE_SPECIALIZATION_TYPENAMES, unused ) \
00068         BOOST_PP_REPEAT_FROM_TO( active_module_count, HARPS_MAX_MODULES_PER_MIXER, HARPS_PP_MODULE_DUMMY, HARPS_MAX_MODULES_PER_MIXER )  \
00069         > { \
00070     public: \
00071       template< typename SampleType > \
00072       void operator()( Buffer< SampleType > &_buffer, CurrentTime &_clock, Note &_note ) { \
00073         HARPS_PP_MUL_OPERATION_ONCE \
00074         BOOST_PP_REPEAT_FROM_TO( 1, active_module_count, HARPS_PP_MUL_OPERATION_LOOP, HARPS_PP_UNUSED ) \
00075       } \
00076     private: \
00077       BOOST_PP_REPEAT( active_module_count, HARPS_PP_MODULE_MEMBER, HARPS_PP_UNUSED ) \
00078   };
00079 
00080 namespace harps {
00081   namespace compornent {
00085     template <
00086     BOOST_PP_REPEAT ( HARPS_MAX_MODULES_PER_MIXER, HARPS_PP_MODULE_TYPENAME_WITH_DEFAULT, HARPS_MAX_MODULES_PER_MIXER )
00087     >
00088     class Mul {
00089       public:
00090         template< typename SampleType >
00091         void operator() ( Buffer< SampleType > &_buffer, CurrentTime &_clock, Note &_note ) {
00092           HARPS_PP_MUL_OPERATION_ONCE
00093           BOOST_PP_REPEAT_FROM_TO ( 1, HARPS_MAX_MODULES_PER_MIXER, HARPS_PP_MUL_OPERATION_LOOP, HARPS_PP_UNUSED )
00094         }
00095       private:
00096         BOOST_PP_REPEAT ( HARPS_MAX_MODULES_PER_MIXER, HARPS_PP_MODULE_MEMBER, HARPS_PP_UNUSED )
00097     };
00098 
00099     BOOST_PP_REPEAT_FROM_TO ( 1, HARPS_MAX_MODULES_PER_MIXER, HARPS_PP_MUL_SPECIALIZATION, HARPS_PP_UNUSED )
00103     template<>
00104     class Mul <
00105           BOOST_PP_REPEAT ( HARPS_MAX_MODULES_PER_MIXER, HARPS_PP_MODULE_DUMMY, HARPS_MAX_MODULES_PER_MIXER )
00106           > {
00107       public:
00108         template< typename SampleType >
00109         void operator() ( Buffer< SampleType > &_buffer, CurrentTime &_clock, Note &_note ) {
00110           int index;
00111           typename Buffer< SampleType >::SampleType *raw_buffer = _buffer.get();
00112           for ( index = 0; index != SAMPLE_COUNT; index++ )
00113             raw_buffer[ index ] = 1.0f;
00114         }
00115     };
00116   }
00117 }
